description: Sandboxing breaks usb connections, so the app can't connect to stlink debuggers.

Tested software with JLINK adapter and it works. 

The graphical editor and code generator often doesn't work. Maybe it doesn't work always with Wayland.

The extra 3rd party modules do not work reliably in certain combinations and require manual fixing as ST doesn't put much effort into it.

Flatpak version is not updated frequently.
summary: works - code generator doesn't not always work

description: The IDE can't connect to st-link debugger.
I was used to all the Tools linke CubeMX and also the CubeIDE with this Linux-Installer and stuff. Having it now on flathub is very very convenient! Thanks a lot!
